Name: The Cornichon
Ingredients: 15 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
5 ml Giffard Piment d'Espelette chile liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of cocktail onion and cornichon.
Review: A cornucopia of flavours with which to get pickled.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Refined and much improved in November 2023.
Nutrition: One serving of The Cornichon contains 148 calories
